config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration code is responsible for building a list of allowed values for the <script> element's type attribute. It checks if the hints contain the key 'KEY_ALLOWED_SCRIPT_TYPES', retrieves the value, and then tokenizes it to add each value to the 'scripts' list.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever the 'KEY_ALLOWED_SCRIPT_TYPES' key is present in the hints. It is triggered when the system needs to determine the allowed script types for the <script> element.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of this configuration option is that it restricts the types of scripts that can be used in the <script> element. This can impact the functionality and security of the system by limiting the types of scripts that can be executed.
